title: 火车MOD里的轨道建设者/铁路建造者怎么不走直线
author: A180273196
txt_content:
本帖最后由 A180273196 于 2012-10-16 23:44 编辑 

谁知道铁路建造在怎么建直线~我用的都是挖隧道

火车MOD里的铁路建造者
就是这个MODhttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-54422-1-18.html
这是官方英文介绍http://trains-and-zeppelin.wikispaces.com/Tracks+Builder
官方铁路建造者英文说明：

In order to start it you need to fill in some fuel and rails/ingots in the proper slots and it need blocks to put right under the rails. The tracks builder will not start if it hasn't everything it needs... If you fill in gold ingots then it will lay down powered rails, If you have Railcraft installed then the tracks builder can lay down any of Railcraft rails  The slots around the builder allows you to change the blocks that the builder lays down. For example you can put BuildCraft pipes in the top slots and the builder will lay them down  Any attached freight cart will be used as inventory extension for the builder Note that the builder only collects ores it won't fill with useless cobblestone  There are two buttons in the interface: "follow tracks" will set if the builder follows pre-existing tracks or remove any tracks in front of it "two blocks under" will set if the builder lays down two blocks under it or only one block  Put a glass block in the "tunnel block slot" and it will build this for you:

一个是下降1格一个下降2格

one block under选这个就是走两步就是向下挖一格~
